thread.title: Jack Sparrow Returns in ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Trailer
thread.title_full: Jack Sparrow Returns in ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Trailer

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Jack Sparrow Returns in ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Trailer
text:
Disney unveiled an action-packed new trailer for the fifth installment in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dean Men Tell No Tales , during the Super Bowl last night — and it featured blazing ships, freaky foes, and Johnny Depp’s return as Captain Jack Sparrow.
Soundtracked by Johnny Cash’s haunting “Ain’t No Grave,” the new clip added a sense of excitement and adventure to the game’s half-time commercials. It gives us an extended look at what’s to come from the upcoming movie, including Sparrow’s weird new foe, Captain Salazar, played by Javier Bardem, a ghost pirate with a very wrinkled face.
Regular cast members Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, and Kevin McNally are all also set to return for the film.
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales is set for release on May 26. Check out the new trailer above, and the first one down below.

In other movie news, here’s your first look at Stranger Things season 2 .
